title: Configure your S3 containers to use in your AI products
datastoreAlert: An S3 user (ObjectStore operator) is required to use S3 containers. To create your S3 datastore, you must be able to enter the access_key and secret_key for your S3 container.
datastoreParagraphe2: Datastores allow you to configure all the necessary elements for your AI products to communicate with your S3 containers.
datastoreParagraphe3: S3 datastores are specific to AI products.
formDatastoreNameErrorPattern: Must only contain numbers, letters, underscores or dashes, must not start with a dash.
formDatastoreToastSuccessDescription: Your S3 datastore has been added
deleteDatastoreDescription: Are you sure you want to delete the {{ alias }} datastore?
deleteDatastoreToastSuccessDescription: The {{ alias }} datastore has been deleted
